description.en:
Pairings: 
- Taichi x Naoto (Escape Journey)
- Hayashida Kan x Shuna (Hadakeru Kaibutsu) 
- Natsuo x Hiro (Renai Rubi no Tadashii Furikata)
[hr]Multi-work series; Suggested reading order:
1: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/15200/]Sabita Yoru Demo Koi wa Sasayaku[/url] - Main Story
2: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/18394/]Azami[/url] - Prequel to Main Story & Sequels
3: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/13498/]Renai Rubi no Tadashii Furikata[/url] - Sequel #1
4: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/19857/]Narrow Place Collection[/url] - Side story to Sequel #1
5: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/17936/]Hadakeru Kaibutsu[/url] - Sequel #2
6: [url=https://mangadex.org/title/24709/]Sweet Sweet[/url] - Extra Illustrations
